languages.text: "Того часа я буду ждать с величайшим нетерпением, шерин! И слава Великому, что обделил ваше сердце надменным равнодушием".

traits.locale_text: "Того часа я буду ждать с величайшим нетерпением, шерин! И слава Великому, что обделил ваше сердце надменным равнодушием".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."
languages.original_text: "Того часа я буду ждать с величайшим нетерпением, шерин! И слава Великому, что обделил ваше сердце надменным равнодушием".

traits.locale_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from the indifference and haughtiness."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from the indifference and haughtiness."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'attendrai l'heure fatidique avec une impatience proche de l'euphorie ! Gloire à l'Exalté qui garde votre cœur de l'indifférence et du dédain. »
languages.original_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."

traits.locale_text: « J'attendrai l'heure fatidique avec une impatience proche de l'euphorie ! Gloire à l'Exalté qui garde votre cœur de l'indifférence et du dédain. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我将战战兢兢、迫不及待地期待这命运的时刻！荣耀归于至高无上的神皇，感谢祂让你的心灵没有一丝冷漠与傲慢。”
languages.original_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."

traits.locale_text: “我将战战兢兢、迫不及待地期待这命运的时刻！荣耀归于至高无上的神皇，感谢祂让你的心灵没有一丝冷漠与傲慢。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde dieser Schicksalsstunde angespannt und ungeduldig entgegenfiebern! Ruhm dem Erhabenen, der hat Euer Herz vor Gleichgültigkeit und Hochmut bewahrt."
languages.original_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde dieser Schicksalsstunde angespannt und ungeduldig entgegenfiebern! Ruhm dem Erhabenen, der hat Euer Herz vor Gleichgültigkeit und Hochmut bewahrt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Esperaré impaciente a que llegue el momento decisivo! Demos gracias al Exaltado por librarl{mf|o|a} de la indiferencia y arrogancia propios de su clase».
languages.original_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."

traits.locale_text: «¡Esperaré impaciente a que llegue el momento decisivo! Demos gracias al Exaltado por librarl{mf|o|a} de la indiferencia y arrogancia propios de su clase».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「その運命の時を、どきどきソワソワ楽しみにしているね！無視されたり見下される生活から心を救ってくださったエグザルテッド・ワンに栄光あれ」
languages.original_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."

traits.locale_text: 「その運命の時を、どきどきソワソワ楽しみにしているね！無視されたり見下される生活から心を救ってくださったエグザルテッド・ワンに栄光あれ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O günü endişe ve sabırsızlık içinde bekliyor olacağım! Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun ki umursamazlıktan ve kibirden sakınmış kalbini."
languages.original_text: "I will look forward to this fateful hour with trepidation and impatience! Glory to the Exalted One, for He spared your heart from indifference and haughtiness."
